items.headline: Join our Slack Community
items.text: New to Slack? Check out this page to get some tips on getting started.

items.headline: Optional User Engagement Workshop in Chicago (7/2)
items.text: Join an incredible group of TOP participants in an interactive workshop to get a deeper understanding of how the program will unfold, and a preview of the next 12 weeks.

items.headline: Problem Statement Orientation
items.text: Dive into the weeds about your problem statement, and get more information about the goals of each challenge.

items.headline: User Research
items.text: In parallel to learning about the problem statements, learn more about the communities that are most affected by them and what their experiences, needs and challenges are like

items.headline: User Research Milestone (7/18)
items.text: Teams join the virtual milestone to share findings from user research that will inform the design of their product, and connect with user advocates to get feedback

items.headline: User Research + Data Exploration
items.text: Teams continue to conduct user research and begin to explore available data sets

items.headline: Continue Data Exploration
items.text: Teams continue to explore available data sets

items.headline: Data Dive Milestone (8/1)
items.text: Teams join the virtual milestone to hear from data stewards and ask questions on available data sets

items.headline: Data Exploration & Product Development
items.text: Teams explore available data sets, connect with data stewards, and begin scoping/developing products

items.headline: Alpha Demo Milestone (8/15)
items.text: Participants come together for a virtual demo of the tools in progress. Teams share concepts and wireframes, and get feedback from user advocates, data stewards, and product experts.

items.headline: Product Development & User Testing
items.text: Teams continue building products and collect user feedback

items.headline: Beta Demos Milestone (8/29)
items.text: Teams come together to showcase and share feedback on more mature versions of their products. Typically, tools have reached at least wireframes and have some functioning features.

items.headline: Product Development & User Testing
items.text:
Teams continue building products and conduct user testing
- Labor Day - Sept 2nd

items.headline: Present final MVPs
items.text: Teams share MVP with TOP team prior to collective rollout
